name: browseros-server
description: Unified BrowserOS server with MCP and Agent support

scripts.build:binary: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile packages/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/browseros-server --minify
scripts.build:binary:linux: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile packages/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/browseros-server --minify --target bun-linux-x64
scripts.build:binary:macos: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile packages/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/browseros-server --minify --target bun-darwin-arm64
scripts.build:binary:windows: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile packages/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/browseros-server.exe --minify --target bun-windows-x64
scripts.dist: rimraf dist && mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile packages/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/browseros-server-linux-x64 --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-linux-x64-modern && bun build --compile packages/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/browseros-server-linux-arm64 --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-linux-arm64 && bun build --compile packages/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/browseros-server-windows-x64.exe --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-windows-x64-modern && bun build --compile packages/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/browseros-server-darwin-arm64 --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-darwin-arm64 && bun build --compile packages/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/browseros-server-darwin-x64 --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-darwin-x64
scripts.docs: npm run docs:generate && npm run format
scripts.clean: rimraf dist browseros-server browseros-server.exe && bun run clean:packages

author: BrowserOS
